bio.zh: 现任南方科技大学创新创意设计学院助理教授。作为人机交互与工业设计交叉领域的研究者，他的工作通过在真实场景中设计和搭建交互系统来探索人工智能、物联网等新兴技术对于学习、教育、家庭、以及特殊群体的意义。
bio.en: Assistant Professor at the School of Design, Southern University of Science and Technology. As a researcher at the intersection of Human-Computer Interaction and Industrial Design, his work explores the significance of emerging technologies such as AI and IoT for learning, education, families, and underprivileged groups through designing and building interactive systems in real-world settings.
